data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I chose the Net::Ewtoo prefix because the module I've developed is
    specific to the Ewtoo class of talkers, and I envision that more
    modules could be added within it, for example Net::Ewtoo::Daemon,
    Net::Ewtoo::Intercom, etc.

    There is another module that provides similar functionality
    (Chatbot::TalkerBot). To be honest I only came across it after I'd
    finished writing my own. I think my attempt stands up weel against
    it - it has a simpler interface and is targetted specifically at
    Ewtoo talkers whereas Chatbot::TalkerBot appears to lean towards
    NUTS.

    Gavin.
